resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The fortress of Strasbourg: the citadel was built after the annexation of the city by the Kingdom of France in 1681. Sébastien Le Prestre, marquis de Vauban (1633-1707) was a key figure in its conception.
resource.chars: The fortress of Strasbourg: the citadel was built after the annexation of the city by the Kingdom of France in 1681. Sébastien Le Prestre, marquis de Vauban (1633-1707) was a key figure in its conception.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Maubeuge (Hainaut). Integrated to the Kingdom of France in 1678 after the Treaty of Nijmegen, the town begins to be fortified under the supervision of Vauban in 1679.
resource.chars: Maubeuge (Hainaut). Integrated to the Kingdom of France in 1678 after the Treaty of Nijmegen, the town begins to be fortified under the supervision of Vauban in 1679.
